version_description:
— Celebrate Christmas with us!
— Laser Cannons. Be careful with it
— New heroes
— New achievements
— New missions
— Fixed small bugs
— Fixed small bugs

— All heroes now have unique skills. Try them all!
— Flash Sales!

— Get a dog. It will help you to find treasures
— New achievements
— New heroes
— Enemies can wear a helmet. Try to kill them now
— Fixed bug with lost progress
— Fixed bugs with Chinese and Japanese localization

— Storm clouds have gathered in the skies above your kingdom. An evil sorcerer has emerged from a dark cave and attacked the peaceful city. Become a hero by finding artifacts to destroy the villain and save your kingdom!
— Dungeons with unique levels
— New enemy: Crusher

— The magnificent Stronghold has replaced the village
— The Underground Kings awakened! Defeat them while digging and receive awesome rewards
— One digging — one biome! Start exploring Jungle or Necropolis from the first step
— 13 new mechanics + refined old enemies
— Daily quests: win rewards including extra lives
— New interface, bug fixes (including invisible enemies!)

Learn more: https://www.facebook.com/digout.community/
— User interface improvements

— User interface improvements
— The distance between checkpoints was significantly reduced
— There are better prizes in the tournament
— The distance between biomes was increased

— Join the tournament! The higher you climb the better prizes you’ll get
— Score high on the leaderboard to move up to the next league and get better prizes

— Join the tournament! The higher you climb the better prizes you’ll get
— Score high on the leaderboard to move up to the next league and get better prizes
— Fixed bugs

— Small Improvements
— Fixed bugs
— It will be easier to find the dungeon

— Teleport
— Small Improvements
— Fixed bugs
— It will be easier to find the dungeon
— Fixed bugs

— Flying stones. We believe stones can fly
— New enemy: explosive snake
— Teleportation to far places
— Snake versus spider. Who is stronger?
— Fixed bugs
— Fixed bugs

— An earthquake has destroyed the city. Help to recover people’s homes
— Complete quests from locals
— UI improvements

— UI improvements
— There are more silver coins in the dungeons
— Life system
— New tools for successful digging: Ice Bomb, Shield, Alchemist Bomb

— New free chests every day
— By popular request from our users we have added an option to get new missions without returning to the village
— Fixed bugs
— Fixed bugs

— Join the tournament! The higher you climb the better prizes you’ll get
— Score high on the leaderboard to move up to the next league and get better prizes

— Join the tournament! The higher you climb the better prizes you’ll get
— Score high on the leaderboard to move up to the next league and get better prizes

— Increased maximum of lives
— New booster: Power up. Get more silver and tournament points in the game and increase your pickaxe durability
— 3 levels of free chest. Get more rewards
— You need less keys to open the chests now
— Checkpoints are safe rooms in your game. Take a break, save your loot, refill equipment and go ahead to dangerous adventures
— Get gold coins from every checkpoint you've reached

— User interface improvements
— The distance between checkpoints was significantly reduced
— There are better prizes in the tournament
— The distance between biomes was increased
— User interface improvements
— User interface improvements

— The magnificent Stronghold has replaced the village
— The Underground Kings awakened! Defeat them while digging and receive awesome rewards
— One digging — one biome! Start exploring Jungle or Necropolis from the first step
— 13 new mechanics + refined old enemies
— Daily quests: win rewards including extra lives
— New interface, bug fixes (including invisible enemies!)

Learn more: https://www.facebook.com/digout.community/

— Meet our first in-game event: "Ghost Hunter". Delve deep into Grandpa' memories of the time when one had to have a great wit to collect diamonds and kill monsters
— Complete the event and win a unique character!
The game now requires an internet connection to provide in-game events and a smooth Tournament’s performance.

— Don’t miss our grand Black Friday sale!
— Is Caleb preparing for war? Learn an intriguing story about a blacksmith

— Don’t miss our grand Black Friday sale!
— Is Caleb preparing for war? Learn an intriguing story about a blacksmith

— Meet our new "Christmas hat-trick" gaming event. Collect snowflakes in the digging to protect from falling stones and more
— 4 new Kings
— New location: Transylvania
— New enemy: Vampire. Slay him before he awakens
— New enemy: Ghost Vampire, a bloodthirsty creature. Don't let him quench his thirst and cure his King
— Explore a new chapter! An unexpected delivery for Talgo. Help Caleb to build the second floor in his smithy! Restore the second tower and fortify the stronghold!

— Meet our new "Christmas hat-trick" gaming event. Collect snowflakes in the digging to protect from falling stones and more
— 4 new Kings
— New location: Transylvania
— New enemy: Vampire. Slay him before he awakens
— New enemy: Ghost Vampire, a bloodthirsty creature. Don't let him quench his thirst and cure his King
— Explore a new chapter! An unexpected delivery for Talgo. Help Caleb to build the second floor in his smithy! Restore the second tower and fortify the stronghold!

— What is the Teleporter capable of? Who destroyed it? What other skills does Caleb the Blacksmith have? Who is going to visit him? Find all the answers in Chapter 9!
— New feature: the Compass! Follow its direction to find a checkpoint with almost no effort ;)

— What is the Teleporter capable of? Who destroyed it? What other skills does Caleb the Blacksmith have? Who is going to visit him? Find all the answers in Chapter 9!
— New feature: the Compass! Follow its direction to find a checkpoint with almost no effort ;)

— What is the Teleporter capable of? Who destroyed it? What other skills does Caleb the Blacksmith have? Who is going to visit him? Find all the answers in Chapter 9!
— New feature: the Compass! Follow its direction to find a checkpoint with almost no effort ;)

— Meet our new gaming event: "Hunt for Hearts". Find crystal hearts in the digging and exchange them left to gifts in a new online store.

— Complete the event and get a unique hero!

— Who destroyed the teleporter? And who saved everyone from certain death? You’ll learn all about it in the new chapter! You can now repair the teleporter and make it work at last!

— Use the teleporter to start your excavation at a great depth right away

— Alchemy is a dangerous science, but an interesting and useful one as well! Alchemy will help you to enhance the energy spheres you can find in your excavations!

— Meet a new character: Chatta, Caleb’s grandmother! Find out where she is going to settle and what in grandmother’s toolbox can scare even the bravest hero!

— New easy to use shop with a widerange of offers

— Meet our new gaming event: "Hunt for Hearts". Find crystal hearts in the digging and exchange them left to gifts in a new online store.

— Complete the event and get a unique hero!

— Who destroyed the teleporter? And who saved everyone from certain death? You’ll learn all about it in the new chapter! You can now repair the teleporter and make it work at last!

— Use the teleporter to start your excavation at a great depth right away

— Meet our new gaming event: "Hunt for Hearts". Find crystal hearts in the digging and exchange them left to gifts in a new online store.

— Complete the event and get a unique hero!

— Who destroyed the teleporter? And who saved everyone from certain death? You’ll learn all about it in the new chapter! You can now repair the teleporter and make it work at last!

— Use the teleporter to start your excavation at a great depth right away

— Alchemy is a dangerous science, but an interesting and useful one as well! Alchemy will help you to enhance the energy spheres you can find in your excavations!

— Meet a new character: Chatta, Caleb’s grandmother! Find out where she is going to settle and what in grandmother’s toolbox can scare even the bravest hero!

— New easy to use shop with a widerange of offers

— Meet a new character: Bard Ravioli! This guy came to the stronghold and got to work straight away. He will help to rebuild a new room - the Throne hall! With this new building, tournament victory will be ever closer!

— New Chapter! Find out what Talgo was planning and how Grandma Chatta helps him with it. In the meantime, while the blacksmith is finishing the second floor of the smithy, the heroes are decorating the stronghold’s second tower.

— 5 new kings

— You can encounter a new totem in the excavation. The Cursed totem shackles gems with chains. Destroy that greedy totem to break the curse.

— New enemy: The Werewolf. Only dangerous during a full moon.

— Darkness thickens in some of the dungeons.

— The mission and chest systems have changed. Now you can open chests directly in the excavation without searching for their keys.

— Meet a new character: Bard Ravioli! This guy came to the stronghold and got to work straight away. He will help to rebuild a new room - the Throne hall! With this new building, tournament victory will be ever closer!

— New Chapter! Find out what Talgo was planning and how Grandma Chatta helps him with it. In the meantime, while the blacksmith is finishing the second floor of the smithy, the heroes are decorating the stronghold’s second tower.

— 5 new kings

— You can encounter a new totem in the excavation. The Cursed totem shackles gems with chains. Destroy that greedy totem to break the curse.

— New enemy: The Werewolf. Only dangerous during a full moon.

— Darkness thickens in some of the dungeons.

— The mission and chest systems have changed. Now you can open chests directly in the excavation without searching for their keys.

— Two new chapters! Behold the true power of alchemy! Find out what Talgo has been up to and see the logo Caleb put on the smithy! Ravioli is still setting up the Throne Hall, and the bridge in the Stronghold has been rebuilt!

— Five new kings

— Don't give in to panic during a dig, or you'll lose control of the hero! Collect gems and kill monsters to conquer your fear!

— Watch out for side winds — they can even blow stones around!

— Two new chapters! Behold the true power of alchemy! Find out what Talgo has been up to and see the logo Caleb put on the smithy! Ravioli is still setting up the Throne Hall, and the bridge in the Stronghold has been rebuilt!

— Five new kings

— Five new kings

— Watch out for side winds — they can even blow stones around!

— Two new chapters! Behold the true power of alchemy! Find out what Talgo has been up to and see the logo Caleb put on the smithy! Ravioli is still setting up the Throne Hall, and the bridge in the Stronghold has been rebuilt!

— Five new kings

— Don't give in to panic during a dig, or you'll lose control of the hero! Kill monsters to conquer your fear!

— Watch out for side winds — they can even blow stones around!

— Start constructing a new building: the Arsenal! Let its strength inspire you!

— Learn how the bard Ravioli saved the whole village and how the blacksmith Caleb fared in a tournament! And see how the goblin Talgo solves the problem of having too many riches!

— 5 new kings

— Watch out! Smoke appeared during excavation and it's hiding all the elements!

— Don't stop while digging, or the roots will ensnare you!

— Beware the worm—it doesn't just hide in the ground! It'll devour you without even noticing!

— Start constructing a new building: the Arsenal! Let its strength inspire you!

— Learn how the bard Ravioli saved the whole village and how the blacksmith Caleb fared in a tournament! And see how the goblin Talgo solves the problem of having too many riches!

— 5 new kings

— Watch out! Smoke appeared during excavation and it's hiding all the elements!

— Don't stop while digging, or the roots will ensnare you!

— Beware the worm—it doesn't just hide in the ground! It'll devour you without even noticing!

— Meet a new character: a nutty professor! And build a building with him: the Scientific Workshop!

— Find out about the dream the goblin brings to life, the strange names the bard finds on an antique goblet, and how the blacksmith is planning to upgrade his foundry!

— Five new kings

— Pay attention and be careful during a dig! Watch out for exploding barrels - they can leak and leave an oily trail behind. If they lose durability, they can explode and set the oil on fire!

— The Stronghold is under attack! Come take part in the new event and take out all the monsters using powerful weapons from the Arsenal!
— Can alchemy really make wishes come true? Find out in the new chapter!
— A secret room with totems in it has appeared in the Stronghold! Ravioli gets an unexpected present, and Caleb has started getting the forge in working order!

— 5 new kings
— Watch out for rocks during a dig! They might turn out to be a sleeping gargoyle!

— Small Improvements.
— Fixed bugs.

— Heroes, decorate the rooms very hard, and Caleb is up to something! No wonder he renovates the implement!
— Is there a spyglass in the Arsenal? Well, now the enemies can't hide!

— 3 new kings

— Heroes, decorate the rooms very hard, and Caleb is up to something! No wonder he renovates the implement!
— Is there a spyglass in the Arsenal? Well, now the enemies can't hide!

— 3 new kings

Greetings, dear players! Here is some features for you!

—  The professor decided to do some useful experiments. Help him and get lots of different prizes!

— What is this special Safebox, capable of multiplying your resources, that has appeared in Stronghold?

— What kind of decoration is Caleb planning to make for the Throne Hall? Why did the Totem scare Talgo so badly, and what was discovered in the Throne Hall? 

— 3 new Kings

Get into the game quick and be the first to find out!

Greetings, treasure hunters! We've finished a new update in Dig Out!

— Halloween is around the corner! Join in our fun, spooky ghost hunt!
— A thief in the Throne hall?! Who could it be?
— Caleb finally found some time to update the Smithy and strengthen the Stronghold Defense!

— 2 new Kings

See you again soon!

Dear treasure hunters!

— Trouble in the Stronghold! Grandpa Trandorn’s cute little sheep got lost in the dungeons! Help get them out, quick!
— We’ve created an Events section and added an icon on the main screen to improve navigation. This section contains all the unique Stronghold events!

See you soon for the next update!

Greetings, treasure hunters! Enjoy another new update! Play the game and be the first to explore it all!

NEW EVENTS:
— Don’t miss out on Black Friday in Dig Out!
— 2 new modes in the Jackpot event: Iron and Crystals
NEW CHAPTER! Discover Grandma Chatta’s dangerous secret!

— Sheep have gotten a little stronger! Now it will be easier to rescue them from the dungeon.

3 NEW KINGS

Greetings, treasure hunters! Enjoy another new update! Play the game and be the first to explore it all!

NEW EVENTS:
— Don’t miss out on Black Friday in Dig Out!
— 2 new modes in the Jackpot event: Iron and Crystals
NEW CHAPTER! Discover Grandma Chatta’s dangerous secret!

— Sheep have gotten a little stronger! Now it will be easier to rescue them from the dungeon.

3 NEW KINGS

Welcome, treasure-seekers! There's a new update for Dig Out ready now!
New event:
— Get to the Winter Celebration in Stronghold in time to obtain valuable prizes and the main reward - a new character!
New chapter:
— What’s the surprise Hero and Caleb are preparing for the bard? What did Talgo get as a gift? And can Ravioli really become a knight?

— 3 NEW KINGS

Dig Out has a new update!

— Now you can get free lives and character fragments in the store!

— Rules of earth blocks generating changed: blocks with strength from 1 to 5 now are mixed within your dig, so you can find them in any depth.

— Monsters and the other types of dangers now can rarely be met in the dig.

Dig Out has a new update!

— Now you can get free lives and character fragments in the store!

— Rules of terra blocks generating changed: blocks with stability from 1 to 5 now are mixed within your dig, so you can find them in any depth.
— Monsters and the other types of dangers now can rarely be met in the dig.

Greetings, treasure-hunters! Welcome to the new update!
New event:
— New event: "Hunt for hearts"! Find hearts on digs and trade them for gifts in the store!
— Changes to the Stronghold Defense event! Now you can increase damage to monsters in the Arsenal! Cards for all monsters are unlocked immediately! The cost of firing has been lowered!
New characters:
— Introducing new characters in the Jackpot: Iron and the Jackpot: Crystals events! Dalia and Vertendi are itching to fight!
New chapter:
— What is the strange casket our heroes found in the Treasure Room, and what gift awaits the bard?

— 4 new kings
Stop by the game to be the first to check it all out!

Welcome to the newest update of Dig Out!
New chapter:
- Caleb forged a crown, but who is it for? How has the Throne hall changed? What is Talgo up to? Learn all the answers in the new chapters!
New kings:
- 2 new kings: bloodthirsty Beta and invincible Raygorn
Upgraded interface:
- Updated interface on digs
- Updated reward screen

Welcome, treasure hunters! Take a look at our new update! Enter the game quick to be the first to discover what's new!


New chapter:
— Our heroes aren't sitting around doing nothing: Caleb has decided to prepare to make his childhood dream come true, Talgo is trying to bring a legend to life, and Ravioli is busy expanding the Throne Hall!



— 2 new kings


Upgrades:
— Improved interface

The latest Dig Out update!

Upgrades:

Greetings, treasure hunters! Time for a new Dig Out update!

See you next time!

Welcome to the new update in Dig Out!

New event:
— New event: Punch Out!
Explore unique dungeons to challenge the vicious Purple Glove Kings. Defeat them all in one-on-one fights and get a new character as a reward!

Hello adventurers! Meet the new game update!

Game event:

— Delve into the memories of Grandfather Trandorn in the Ghost Hunter event. Play as a young hunter grandfather, be smart and complete all the unique missions! And as a reward for your efforts, unlock a new character!

Greetings, treasure-hunters! Time for a new Dig Out update!

Upgrades:
— Removed technical bugs

The latest Dig Out update!

NEW EVENT - Black Friday:

— Incredibly good deals in Dig Out! Turn over all the cards and learn what Caleb's preparing for.

NEW CHAPTER:

— Find out what kind of childhood toy Caleb forged, and what Talgo and Grandma Chatta have been getting up to.

NEW KINGS:

— Gold Digger Jack tries to steal your lovely gold. Stop the bandit!

— The Mistwick Witch and her Army of Darkness are threatening Stronghold. Defeat them!

NEW MECHANIC:

— The drill helps to destroy earth without spending pickaxe energy.

NEW BOOSTERS SYSTEM:

— From now on, you will no longer be able to use Ice Bombs, but they have been replaced by a Magic Shield that can protect you from any danger in the dungeon!

— The Alchemist Bomb has become more useful for restoring your pickaxe on digs.

— The Golden Pickaxe's bonuses now include additional damge to kings, and also passive pickaxe restoration at checkpoints. Plus this boost is no longer automatically taken with you on digs!

Welcome, adventure seekers! A new update is here!

New character - Monkey King:

— The Monkey King is a legendary hero with the ability to summon a shock wave that stuns enemies and destroys traps and rocks.

Welcome, treasure-seekers! There's a new update for Dig Out ready now!


Game event - Winter Celebration:
— Get to the Winter Celebration in the Stronghold in time to obtain valuable prizes and the big reward - a Christmas character!

Urgent news! Hurry up to update the game:
- Treasure Season! Take part in time-limited events, dig and collect silver to obtain rewards as you advance through the season. Remember that the Golden Ticket gives access to fantastic treasures!
- Training Camp! Complete the challenges to find out what dangers lurk underground and how to withstand monsters and overcome obstacles. Practice makes perfect!
- The Jackpot event were significantly improved!
